title: 美眾議員雷斯琴薩萊爾：我提案要求國會拒絕撥款世衛，直至譚德塞辭職

replies.msg:
Today, I introduced legislation calling on Congress to withhold federal funds from the @WHO until @DrTedros resigns.

America is the WHO’s largest contributor. It’s not right that Americans' hard-earned taxpayer dollars are used to propagate the CCP’s lies.
